price: and has made me dutiful to my mother, and has not made me an oppressor or disobedient.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
